summary: This bill, the Staff Sergeant John D. Martek Purple Heart Restoration Act, aims to award the Purple Heart to veterans who suffered a traumatic brain injury (TBI) resulting from an act of an enemy, regardless of the injury date. It directs the Secretary concerned to treat these veterans similarly to those wounded in action and outlines the application process. The bill defines veterans and service-connected disabilities and tasks the Secretaries with establishing a process for applications.
